text: (Peue-peue nyang geuyue uleh Sulaiman ) Jipubuet dum nyan hana jibantah Mihrab meusijid got patong-patong Atawa palong nyang raya leupah Palong nyang raya taeu sang kulam Kanot beulangong lungkee hana glah Tapubuet chuko hai kawom Daod Keubit that patot chuko keu Allah Teuma hamba Lon nit nyang tem chuko Di jih teukabo sang droe jih meugah
